mapper.select: SELECT * FROM WeatherHourlyData order by inputdatetime,dataType;
mapper.update: MERGE INTO WeatherHourlyData USING (SELECT 1 AS DUM) X ON (inputdatetime = #{inputdatetime} and dataType=#{dataType} and inputdatetime=#{inputdatetime}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET ${baseTime}=#{value} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (dataType, inputdatetime, ${baseTime}) VALUES(#{dataType}, #{inputdatetime}, #{value});
